Uses of Class
xxl.core.math.functions.AggregationFunction

  • Packages that use AggregationFunction 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.cursors.mappers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.functions
    Functions are an extremely important concept to encapsulate abstractions.
    xxl.core.math
    The package xxl.core.math provides classes that issue mathematical topics.
    xxl.core.math.functions
    The package xxl.core.math.functions contains necessary classes and interfaces to work with real-valued functions.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric provides several methods based on nonparametric statistics.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates provides implementations of the techniques proposed in [HHW97]: J.
    xxl.core.relational.cursors
    The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors.
    xxl.core.spatial.cursors
    Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data.

    • Uses of AggregationFunction in xxl.core.math.functions

      Subclasses of AggregationFunction in xxl.core.math.functions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaptiveAggregationFunction
      This class provides an adaptive online aggregation strategy by performing a convex merging of two objects.
      class  CountingAggregationFunction<P,A> 
      class  DecoratorAggregationFunction<P,A>
      A decorator-aggregation-function decorates (wraps) an aggregation-function by passing given arguments to the invoke method of the wrapped aggregation-function.
      class  DistinctAggregationFunction<P,A>
      This class realizes an aggregation-function performing an early duplicate elimination during an aggregate operation.
      class  DistinctMetaDataAggregationFunction<P,A,M>
      This class realizes a metadata aggregation-function performing an early duplicate elimination during an aggregate operation.
      class  FunctionAggregationFunction<T,P extends T,A extends T>
      This class wraps afunction to an aggregation-function.
      class  MetaDataAggregationFunction<P,A,M>
      Decorates a given aggregation function with metadata information.
      class  SplineCompressedFunctionAggregateFunction
      This class provides a compression algorithm based upon the approximation of real-valued one-dimensional functions by a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolate used as an aggregation function for online aggregation of given numerical data without any error control.
      class  StatelessAggregationFunction<P,A,R>

    • Uses of AggregationFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates

      Subclasses of AggregationFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConditionedCount<I> 
      class  ConfidenceAggregationFunction
      In the context of online aggregation aggregates are iteratively computed.
      class  Count
      Computes iteratively the number of given objects that are not null.
      class  CountAll
      Counts iteratively the number of given objects (inclusive null-objects).
      class  FourthCentralMomentEstimator
      Estimates iteratively the fourth central moment of given numerical data without any error control.
      class  LastN
      Stores the last 'seen' n objects.
      class  LastNthAverage
      Computes the average of the n last seen numbers without any error control.
      class  Maximum
      Computes the maximum of given data without any error control wrt.
      class  Minimum
      Computes the minimum of given data without any error control wrt.
      class  NumberOfRuns
      Computes the number of runs in a given sequence with respect to an ordering imposed by a comparator.
      class  NumericalAggregateND
      This class combines a given number of aggregate functions for numerical data to process data of type double [] with aggregate functions consuming objects of type number in one pass.
      class  ReservoirSample
      This class provides sampling algorithms for the usage with the aggregator cursor.
      class  StatefulAverage
      Estimates iteratively the average of given numerical data without any error control.
      class  StatefulStandardDeviation
      Computes the standard deviation step-by-step on numerical data without any error control using StatefulVariance.
      class  StatefulStandardDeviationEstimator
      Computes an estimation of the standard deviation step-by-step on numerical data without any error control using StatefulVarianceEstimator.
      class  StatefulVariance
      Computes the variance in a recursive manner using an algorithm based upon [Wes79]: D.H.D.
      class  StatefulVarianceEstimator
      Computes an estimation of the variance (in this case the sample variance) in a recursive manner using an algorithm based upon [Wes79]: D.H.D.
      class  StatelessAverage
      Provides the same functionality as StatefulAverage but keeps the count information.
      class  StatelessStandardDeviation
      Provides the same functionality as StatefulStandardDeviation but keeps the state information.
      class  StatelessStandardDeviationEstimator
      Provides the same functionality as StatefulStandardDeviationEstimator but keeps the state information.
      class  StatelessVariance
      Provides the same functionality as StatefulVariance but keeps the state information.
      class  StatelessVarianceEstimator
      Provides the same functionality as StatefulVarianceEstimator but keeps the state information.
      class  Sum
      Computes iteratively the sum of given numerical data without any error control.
      class  SumEstimator
      This class provides an estimator for the aggregation function SUM.
      class  ThirdCentralMomentEstimator
      Estimates iteratively the third central moment of given numerical data without any error control.

      internally used one-dimensional aggregate functions working on numerical data
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.AVERAGE_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering averages (each for a row)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.COUNT_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering counts (each for a row; should all be similar)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.MAXIMUM_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering maxima (each for a row)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.MINIMUM_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering minima (each for a row)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.STANDARDDEVIATION_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering standard deviations (each for a row)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.SUM_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering sums (each for a row)
      static AggregationFunction NumericalAggregateND.VARIANCE_ND
      aggregation function for n-dimensional numerical data delivering variances (each for a row)
